title: Plz suggest a name for my website.
content:
hello typophiles..  
am buying a domain name for my website in a day or two.  
Plz suggest a good typographic(or any) name for it...Am not able to think  
a good name so thought I should take your help..may be you have some interesting names....so plz help and suggest whatever you think better.  
Basically am gonna showcase my typography and motion graphics works on it.

thanks a lot

satya,  
India
author: satya

comments.content:
rajography.com

hhp
thanks hrant..but does it mean anything?

Satyavision

ChrisL

Your last name is Rajpurohit? And "raj" evokes Indian, in the US at least.

hhp

<cite>Your last name is Rajpurohit? And “raj” evokes Indian, in the US at least.</cite>

It sounds like biography of whole rajpurohit community :) but interesting.

Does your intended website have a particular look or identity? For example, is the site going to echo any aspect of traditional or modern indian graphic design culture in any way? The name itself might support your intended identity? Perhaps you could post some screen shots of the pages.

You have a great name, why not use that?
satya.com
satyarist.com

[http://paratha.in](http://web.archive.org/web/20110815084618/http:/paratha.in/ "http://paratha.in")

( this is the Italian meaning : [http://www.etimo.it/gifpic/09/13f7bd.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20110815084618/http:/www.etimo.it/gifpic/09/13f7bd.png "http://www.etimo.it/gifpic/09/13f7bd.png") )

i've though something but didnt liked them.

\>essen.in [SN]  
\>tyop.in  
\>re-type.in  
\>parallax.in  
\>satyapography.in  
\>teafortype.com  
\>typeindia.in  
\>

satyazoom

satyavavavoom

satyaselfdownandhaveacuppateamate - okay thats just silly.

;-)
I'd vote for Satyapography....

I have to agree with David that satya.com is a good idea. URLs should be direct and simple. I sort of like satyapography.in, but I think that complex wordplays have no real place in URLs, they just end up being to confusing. Peoples' minds will revert to the real words, and then they will type in satyatypography.in instead, and then be angry when the URL doesn't work.

Although, I actually sort of like satyatype.in and satya-type.in…

teafortype.com is really cute, but it sounds a bit too parlor type…

typeindia.in is actually really good, but would be a better URL for an India-wide typographic portal than a personal website.

Satype.in  
Thickandth.in  
Graphicsatya.in  
Perpetualmotion.in

Tim
I like satya.com too but it's taken and it's a pretty wacky site - check it out. Papyrus.

Yo! Satya is back!  
Check out this thread, some suggestions were brilliant.  
 [http://typophile.com/node/20523](http://web.archive.org/web/20110815084618/http:/typophile.com/node/20523 "http://typophile.com/node/20523")

_satyaselfdownandhaveacuppateamate - okay thats just silly._  
Lol!

There is only one OBVIOUS choice:

DB~

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110815084618im_/http:/typophile.com/files/satya_5737.gif)

Satyasfied

ChrisL

satyasfaction  
satyarated ;)

type.in would be great but it's taken

justype.in  
satyagraphy.com

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
 AL  
 [lenart.pl](http://web.archive.org/web/20110815084618/http:/www.lenart.pl/)

A slight variation that may be more straight forward and has less potential for confusion could be:

satyatype.com/.in

I also like:  
Satype.com/.in  
Satyapography.com/.in

teafortype.com is nice as well. It is a little playful, but if you think of having tea with someone as a time to sit, talk and listen, then it is also honest it could signify your openness to discussion, etc.

Duncan

chaifortype.com/.in  
chaipography.com/.in

Be proud of your country, use the national adress.

[www.satya.in](http://web.archive.org/web/20110815084618/http:/www.satya.in/ "www.satya.in")

I would definately go for that.

A short name, and it doesnt have to say in the adress what you do, you will eventually load the name with the right stuff anyway..
I think that it is best to have both you country address AND .com. That way, people who enter in your URL thinking it has a .com address will be redirected. It helps people find you better.

agree with Goran, you will eventually get bored of weird, funny addresses and you'll wish you had adopted a simple and short name instead. Plus Satya is a beautiful name, I don't know if it's a common name in India but from here it sounds sexy and exotic.

Satyastudios

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
Hiro

\> ... but from here it sounds sexy and exotic.

Yah! That's what has made me think of YaSatya.out.in

I didnt get satya.in as its been already taken by someone.

for now..  
 [http://www.typesatya.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20110815084618/http:/www.typesatya.com/ "http://www.typesatya.com")

I know its not that good name though.

\>I know its not that good name though.

I think that it sounds like a great name. And that typeface it is sporting at the moment looks quite cool, too.

Congratulations! And this flower is just for your consideration!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110815084618im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Wheel_4692.gif)

spam deleted

- Eben Sorkin

i like satype.in and satyatype.in  
i suggest: satyadesign.in and satyaletters.in or satyfaces.in  
maybe you would like satyandco.in , satyabureau.in or even better: satya&frerejones.in ;)
